EmailTemplate.name: Early Bird v.2
EmailTemplate.subject: Special Offer: 1099 E-File
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Special Offer: 1099 E-File
Dear {!BLANKVALUE(Contact.Name, "Valued Customer")}
Thank you for taking the time to discuss your business needs. I’m excited to help make sure your business stays compliant with our 1099 E-file Service. You can use the service to create electronic 1099-MISC forms to provide your contractors, as well as electronically file with the IRS.
Ready to get started?
Access the 1099 E-file Service now If you use QuickBooks (Online Plus or Desktop), you can save time and import your data by accessing directly from the Vendor Menu If you use Intuit Online Payroll, just start in Taxes & Forms
As I mentioned in our conversation, we’re offering 20% off if you file by January 16th. It’s our way of helping make sure we don’t let the IRS deadlines slip by.
Finally, a reminder about a few key deadlines:
January 16th – Last day for Early Bird special pricing February 1st – IRS deadline to provide copies to contractors March 31st – IRS deadline to e-file your 1099-MISC forms
Thank you again – we look forward to helping you meet your 1099-MISC deadlines this year!
If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us.
Best, Intuit QuickBooks Team
Intuit, Inc., Customer Communications 2800 E. Commerce Center Place, Tucson, AZ 85706.
IMPORTANT NOTICE: Intuit respects the personal nature of email and this email is being sent at your verbal request. A previously stated opt out does not apply to this email. If you would like to update your contact preferences, you may do so at this location.
This feature is available in QuickBooks Desktop 2012 and later, as well as QuickBooks Online Plus. Users of other versions of QuickBooks can still access the service here, but will not have data import available. Regular pricing starts at $14.99, which includes your first 3 forms. Additional forms are $3.99. Early Bird pricing starts at $12.99, with additional forms $2.99 each
